Welcome to the College Study Buddy Application! 

Our Vision
Due to the covid 19 pandemic, communication has been a major issue between students, instructors, and the TA. Cumbersome communication methods such as email are often not timely enough for high-priority questions and organizing events/meetups can often be difficult. This often leads to late submissions and a penalty for many students which can be solved through our application. Our goal is to create a bridge between the students and the TA to make communication more efficient. 

Who We Are?
Just like every college student, we are a team of developers trying to help students have a better learning experience in college. We started off as strangers and ended up working days and nights to aid students in the process of earning their degrees.
